variant_chr_pos_alt_ref.name: variant_chr_pos_alt_ref
variant_chr_pos_alt_ref.description: Create a variant ID with chromosome, position, alt and ref
variant_chr_pos_alt_ref.output_column_description: variant ID with chromosome, position, alt and ref

VARTYPE.name: VARTYPE
VARTYPE.description: Variant type (e.g. SNV, INDEL, MNV, BND...)
VARTYPE.output_column_description: Variant type: SNV if X>Y, MOSAIC if X>Y,Z or X,Y>Z, INDEL if XY>Z or X>YZ
operation_query: WHEN REF LIKE '%,%' OR ALT LIKE '%,%' THEN 'MOSAIC'
WHEN LENGTH(REF) == LENGTH(ALT) AND LENGTH(REF) > 1 THEN 'MNV'

NOMEN.name: NOMEN
NOMEN.description: NOMEN information (e.g. NOMEN, CNOMEN, PNOMEN...) from HGVS nomenclature field

FINDBYPIPELINE.name: FINDBYPIPELINE
FINDBYPIPELINE.description: Number of pipeline that identify the variant (for multi pipeline VCF)

FINDBYSAMPLE.name: FINDBYSAMPLE
FINDBYSAMPLE.description: Number of sample that have a genotype for the variant (for multi sample VCF)

GENOTYPECONCORDANCE.name: GENOTYPECONCORDANCE
GENOTYPECONCORDANCE.description: Concordance of genotype for multi caller VCF

variant_id.name: variant_id
variant_id.description: Variant ID generated from variant position and type
